description: Prevents the synthesis tool from optimizing or moving specified instances or nets.
query: Given the following TCL file, optimize for high performance by ensuring that the specified instances or nets {string} are not optimized or moved by the synthesis tool.

description: Specifies library cells that the synthesis tool should not use.
query: Given the following TCL file, optimize for low power consumption by specifying that the synthesis tool should not use the {string} library cell.
